==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しゅく|いん|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅくいん}}

# a [[bless]]ed [[seal]], [[stamp]] or [[insignia]]
# making a [[vow]] while closing a [[seal]]: a [[solemn]] [[oath]]

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|呪印|じゅいん}}: a [[cursed]] seal, stamp or insignia; making a vow while closing a seal: a solemn oath
